channel.title: Zsh on Sandarenu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Zsh on Sandarenu's Blog

item.title: Super Charge Your Shell with ZSH
item.description: I’ve being using Linux as my primary OS for about 6 years. Since I’m doing programming all the time, I use shell all the time to perform various task from compiling to commiting code. First I used the normal Terminal comes with Ubuntu and then for about three years I’ve being using Terminator. Terminator is better than normal terminal since it has split screen feature. But no matter what the frontend, underneath It is still the BASH.
